trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Charlottesville
There was one other sighting in Charlottesville on or around January 27th 2013
Summary: Moved up Fast From behind house, In 1:10 seconds of video that I taped.
divs: Sighting DetailsJan 27th 2013 Sun around 4PM, I was taking pictures of the Sky then I Saw moving up from behind house across the street and spining lift to right a Silver UFO as I turned the Cam to Video I taped 1:10 seconds befor the UFO Vanshied from view.
